content.rendered:
Directed by Bumpy.

Written by Baljeet Singh Marwah. Baljeet Singh Marwah. Baljeet Singh Marwah. Ishita Moitra.

Cast Riteish Deshmukh(Champak Chandrakant Chiplunkar). Vivek Oberoi(Amjad Khan). Rhea Chakraborty(Gayatri Ganguly). Sahil Vaid(Jugnu). Bhuvan Arora(Gulab). Vikram Thapa(Genda). Vikram Gokhale(Shashank Thakur (as Vikram Gokhle)). Upendra Limaye(Home Minister Dongardive). Naveen Kaushik(Ashutosh Sharma). Sandesh Kulkarni(ACP Akhilesh Aane). Baba Sehgal(Baba Sehgal). Ramakant Dayma(Bank Manager). Harpal Singh Sokhi(Fake Sardar Hostage). Suresh Venkat(Commissioner Singh). R. Balasubramaniam(CBI Chief). Hemant Soni(Head Constable Sakharam). Kavesh Majmudar(Mukesh (as Kavish Majmudar)). Pradeep Shukla(Mukesh’s Father). Dhaval Barbhaya(Bank Executive). Vijay Kaushal(Guard 1). Amit Gautam(Guard 2). Divyajoytee Sharma(Fake Irritating Aunty hostage). Subhasis Chakraborty(Inquisitive Hostage). Ankit Verma(Phone Obsessed Fake Hostage). Shyam(Chotu Chaiwala). Savish Sindhu(Cameraman Bittu). Sharmila Joshi(Mrs. Dongardive). Abhishek Narayan(Reporter 1). Akriti Singh(Reporter 2). Sachin Danai(ATS Officer). Rachit Jadoun(Saatu). Puneet Maloo(Bank Executive). Arif Shahdoli(Politician). Brijesh Tiwari(Camera Man Zee News). Salman Jaffery(Black cat comondo (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Raunaq Bajaj. Aditya Chopra. Ashish Patil. Rajat Kanti Sarkar. Aashish Singh. Nikhil Taneja.

Production Yash Raj Films.
